item.title: Aspose.Cells for SharePoint 3.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for SharePoint 3.0.0 We are happy to announce Aspose.Cells for SharePoint v3.0.0! New Features Allow conversions of multiple files at a time Document preview within SharePoint Enhancements Add support for new formats (XLSB, MHtml, XPS, TIFF, SVG, DIF) for conversion Optimize Aspose.Cells for SharePoint component
